subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: David Price pitched eight innings of one-run ball as the Tigers snapped the Mariners’ five-game winning streak. David Ortiz hit two homers, including his 400th with the Red Sox.
snippet: David Price pitched eight innings of one-run ball as the Tigers snapped the Mariners’ five-game winning streak. David Ortiz hit two homers, including his 400th with the Red Sox.
